code: import React,{useEffect}from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{useDispatch,useSelector}from'react-redux';import{Carousel,CarouselItem,Image}from'react-bootstrap';import Message from'./Message';import{getTopRatedProducts}from'../actions/productActions';import'../styles/product-carousel.css';import CarouselSkeleton from'../components/CarouselSkeleton';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";var ProductCarousel=function ProductCarousel(){var dispatch=useDispatch();var productTopRated=useSelector(function(state){return state.productTopRated;});var error=productTopRated.error,loading=productTopRated.loading,products=productTopRated.products;useEffect(function(){dispatch(getTopRatedProducts());},[dispatch]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[loading&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CarouselSkeleton,{}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Message,{dismissible:true,variant:"danger",children:error}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Carousel,{style:{marginTop:'0.5em'},pause:"hover",className:"bg-primary",indicators:false,interval:10000,children:products&&products.map(function(product){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CarouselItem,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"/product/".concat(product._id),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Image,{src:product.image,alt:product.name,fluid:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Carousel.Caption,{className:"carousel-caption",children:[product.name," (",product.price.toLocaleString('en-IN',{maximumFractionDigits:2,style:'currency',currency:'INR'}),")"]})]})},product._id);})})]});};export default ProductCarousel;
